name: Dead Dundee Rats - A River's Journey
name_original: Dead Dundee Rats - A River's Journey
description:
Use mouse to click and drag to draw a path for your water!

*IF THE GAME IS TOO LAGGY IN BROWSER FOR YOU PLS DOWNLOAD THE ZIP*

A challenging river carving game where the player directs water flow down different environments, avoiding obstacles and polluted waters to help your river reach its final destination. As you progress, the water you save is recycled and used in the proceeding levels. Whether you wish to redo the level multiple times to maximize your freshwater or not is up to you. 

If you are not able to make it to the end with fresh water then you've encountered the point of this game and experienced a fraction of the struggle that many people go through in the quest for water. 

Hopefully, it also teaches you a few water facts!
